content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Advanced Software Engineer (ASE) is a role assigned to an employee responsible for building solutions across different platforms and ecosystems, creation new platforms, and involvement in most complex engineering tasks. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For Advanced Software Engineers, their main role and work process are described at \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epa.ms/whoisASE\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Who is Advanced Software Engineer KB\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Advanced Software Engineers fulfill a wide range of responsibilities. Because of this, the career expectations around those responsibilities are distributed across qualification Levels from 1 through 5. Check out \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epa.ms/aseGCF\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Advanced Software Engineer's title requirements (GCF)\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" to familiarize yourself with Job Function and Levels. The title of Advanced Software Engineer can be granted only by an \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMASMT/Assessment\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Assessment \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"committee’s recommendation, with the subsequent approval of Job Function change by EPAM CTO.  \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://epa.ms/whoisase\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":255550,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d90525bf-855d-466a-bcbe-eeb8e9a88c9b/Image2.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d90525bf-855d-466a-bcbe-eeb8e9a88c9b/Image2.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Image2.PNG\",\"name\":\"Image2.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"d90525bf-855d-466a-bcbe-eeb8e9a88c9b\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":969,\"height\":383},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
